title: Yasuo - real talk
body:
Yasuo on your team who feeds. You all know what I'm talking about.

Now, my question is:

What about Yasuo attracts the intellectually-challenged?

Is it the samurai character - which one might consider super cool?

Is it his kit? His outplay ability? His ability to 1v5?

By the way, his ability to outplay and 1v5 hinges on two scenarios.

1. You're actually good, and you get ahead - which is purely hypothetical, because we all know Yasuo players are never able to get themselves ahead.
2. The game goes for 40 hours, so you're able to get full items, despite going 0/25/2.

Stop fucking using Yasuo, you derelict, delusional, heavy bastards.
